name: Washing machine

name: Mini Fridge
description:
Mr L is an elderly client known to Thye Hua Kwan Moral Charities (THKMC). He is alone at home most of the time as he has weak lower limbs and is unable to walk long distances. 

THKMC is looking for a mini fridge for food storage.  

If you know of someone who has the items for donation, please Whatsapp Xin Yi at 8292 2214.

Since October 2011, THKMC was incorporated as a charity with an IPC status to provide multiple social and welfare services to the community at large. THKMC provides assistance to the Elderly, Families, Children & Youth, and Persons with Disabilities, through more than 70 programmes and services.     

THK Elderly Services Division provides many programmes and services to serve the elderly in need – one of which includes THK Cluster Support. THK Cluster Support provides social support through case management, monitoring, and basic counselling services to vulnerable seniors, and facilitates coordination in the provision of community-based care and support services to the seniors. This service aims to improve the quality of life of vulnerable seniors, particularly for low or no income seniors who are socially-isolated and have minimal or no family support.

Family is struggling financially due to sibling's debt especially. Client plans to work next year after approved subsidised student care. Pri sch only provides laptop loans at $200 each which family cant afford. 2 laptops for the elder children would help with their HBLs and defray additional cost for family.

contact.name: Nur Ashikin Binte Hazlan

name: Laptop
description: Client is unable to seek and sustain full-time employment as she is focusing on mental health recovery. However, she has started on home-based crafting to keep herself meaningfully engaged. A laptop will be helpful for her to seek out online resources and a supportive tool as she is keeping a look out for home-based jobs. She is currently on financial assistance and has limited family support.

name: Used laptop
description:
Client is a 60 year old man, caring for his wife who is currently receiving treatment for cancer. Client is a freelance worker and is currently unable to secure projects due to his caregiver role. 
Client's laptop broke down recently, and has affected his work.

name: Laptop with HDMI cable
description:
Client is a stage 4A Cervical Cancer patient. She is unemployed and has to financially support her two teenage children. Currently, she is heavily dependent on the social service agencies for financial assistance but she has also made several attempts to work on ad-hoc basis despite her poor health.  

Client’s washing machine and refrigerator are malfunctioned. Therefore, she hopes to get a new one so that she does not need to wash her clothes by hand and her fresh food could last longer, if kept in a refrigerator. She would also like to request for a laptop with HDMI cable as she is attending an online course now in order to secure a job.

name: Laptop
description:
Client is currently attending a course to upgrade herself to pursue her dreams to be an early childhood educator, while caring for 4 young children. 
Family does not have a laptop and face financial challenges. 
A laptop is needed for client's course, and will also be helpful for the children if they need it for school.

name: Laptop with MS office ( good condition)
description: Client is a single mother with three young children. She works full-time while managing care of the children, and her job requires her to submit reports that she requires using MS office on. She currently toggles between using her children’s laptop loaned from the school for their HBL, or borrowing from colleagues. However, this is not sustainable and creates inconvenience and delay in her submitting her work. Client is also the sole breadwinner of her family.

contact.org: AMKFSC Community Services Ltd - Cheng San
contact.name: Janetta Tan

name: Transport support to school for student with special needs
description:
Family of 4 has a teenager with special needs. The family is on financial assistance. Due to teenager's unique mood issues, he has difficulty taking the school bus during his hyper moods. The family previously coped by taking private hire during teenager's hyper moods that occur every month for approximately 2 weeks. However, these fares take up a significant proportion of the family's income. 
Mother is a responsible lady who prioritises her children despite her several health conditions. She is also the full-time caregiver for the teenager with special needs.  
Transport support for the family would be very helpful in reducing the stressors for this family and will allow the teenager to continue to have access to school during his hyper moods.

name: Ensure Liquid (Strawberry Flavour)
description:
Patient is a 79 year old male who is married with a son. He requires assistance with his Activities of Daily Living (ADLs). Patient’s son is unemployed as he is the main caregiver for patient.
 
Patient was recommended by hospital to consume 2 cans of Ensure Liquid daily to supplement his diet. The family has difficulty affording the ongoing medical consumables due to son’s unemployment. 
The item can be found here: https://rehabmart.com.sg/nursing/nutrition/wellness-nutrition/ensure-liquid-strawberry (Rehab Mart) or https://www.pinkpharm.com/products/ensure-liquid-250ml?_pos=1&_sid=62c0a0f5d&_ss=r (PinkPharm). 

Kindly arrange for the donated items to be delivered to patient’s house directly. You can WhatsApp Jia Ling at 82479135 for details. Thank you!

name: Cat foods and necessities
description: Family with children facing financial strains are caring for 10 cats. They would need some support to purchase necessities for the cats while we work with family to seek for adopters.

name: Oven (for baking)
description: Client is a family of 4 with 2 school going children. She has been feeling stressed over the family's financial situation and caregiving duties (1 child with special needs). Client loves to bake, and baking is an effective way for her to cope with her stress. However, she has stopped baking since her oven broke down a few months ago. She does not have the finances to purchase a new oven. Thus, a new/working oven would be beneficial for her.

contact.org: MWS Covenant Family Service Centre - Hougang
contact.name: Chan Jun Ren

name: Citravescent
description:
Patient is a 60 year old gentleman who is paralysed waist down. He has been unemployed since 2017 due to medical conditions and relies on his helper for his Activities of Daily Living (ADLs). Patient is receiving insurance payout, however is only sufficient to cover the helper fees and their daily expenditures.
He requires the use of citravescent three times a day due to his medical condition on a long-term basis, however is unable to afford them. The item can be found on Shopee: https://bit.ly/3pl1w04 or Lazada: https://bit.ly/3qYjSUW . You can also buy at any shops. Kindly arrange the donated items to be delivered to patient’s house directly. You can contact Jia Ling at 82479135 via WhatsApp. Thank you.

name: Food rations

name: 10 X 500g dried whole anchovy
description: We are requesting for 10 packets of 500g dried whole anchovy as we cook 3 meals a day for our residents from Monday to Saturday. The Helping Hand is a Voluntary Welfare Organization affiliated with the National Council of Social Service. We run a home providing drug rehabilitation and after-care services to male drug addicts and ex-offenders in Singapore. This is a residential programme carried out in our agency home, which was graciously provided by the Singapore government in recognition of our services to the community. We have a total of about 100 residents and staff staying in at our premises.

name: Round Dining table with 4 chairs
description: Client is a mother of 3 children(F/14,F/6,F/8) and unfit to work due to health concern and caregiving issue. Client’s husband is the sole breadwinner of the family of 5. Your kind blessing of the following items will ease the family's tight financial situation and allow them to better organise their space. The family deeply appreciates your great support. Thank you! (Xin mo)

contact.org: THK Family Service Centre @ Bedok North
contact.name: Teddy Fu

name: 13 inch Orthopedic Queen Sized Mattress
description: Single mum staying in 2 room flat who suffers from spinal pain due to work injury and is currently still doing manual work as still needs to support child who is in poly and repay housing loans. Doctor has advised her numerous times that she needs a surgery but there is high risk of paralysis. She is unable to sleep at night due to the pain. Meanwhile, doctor advised to get a orthopedic mattress to support her back better so that she will at least be able to sleep at night. As she shares the bed with her daughter, she needs a queen sized mattress with at least thickness of 13 inches so that she will have no trouble getting down to the mattress.

contact.org: MontfortCare - Marine Parade Family Service Centre
contact.name: Joi Tan

name: Storage rack
description: We have shifted to a sponsored storage space and we need a storage rack to put up our logistics as the space given is small. One storage rack is good enough with the above mentioned size.

name: Double decker bunk beds (1x)
description: Family of 6 with 4 children (age 14, 12, 10, 10) living in a 4-room flat. Family were previously Malaysia citizens and paying full unsubsidized school fees, hence their house furnitures were very old/ donated/ taken from recycling site. Requesting for 1x stable double decker bunk bed for children so as to give them some personal space. Appreciate for donor to cover delivery, dismantle and re-assemble parts to client house. Thank you!

name: Sliding door wardrobe
description: Single mother with three children requires a sliding door wardrobe (120cm length x 190cm tall) as theirs has spoilt. Sliding door preferred due to limited space in the 1 bedroom flat. She has just started work as a hawker assistant and does not have the means to buy a new wardrobe. Appreciate if donor can deliver.

name: Kitchen Cabinet
description:
Client is a single mother with 2 young children (9/F and 5/M). Client’s spouse passed away early 2020.The family does not have their own home and were staying at open market rental, but due to financial struggle and caregiving needs by client, she applied for HDB public rental unit.HDB recently assigned a public rental unit to her, and she needs support with basic furnishing and electrical appliances.

She hopes to seek help for a kitchen cabinet to store/place kitchen items. For further liaison, do contact Nurul via whatsapp at 98598767.

name: Loft Bunk Bed
description: Single mother with 1 school-going daughter requires a loft bunk bed (something like https://www.ikea.com/sg/en/p/stora-loft-bed-frame-white-stain-70242086/) in order for the daughter to have space below to put a study desk for her studying, and for them to have sufficient sleeping space. They are staying in a small rental flat with 1 bedroom and would like to maximise the space. Single mother is working part-time and is unable to purchase a brand new bed. Appreciate if donor can deliver.

name: Kitchen cabinet
description: Client is unemployed due to medical condition. She was unable to secure stable employment previously due to ongoing medical issues. She is certified unfit for work for 6 months w.e.f. 15/10/2021. Client has just shifted to her new 1-room rental flat. Due to financial difficulties and limited financial resources, she is unable to afford the purchase of some household items and will benefit from donation.

name: Triple Decker bed
description:
Client and her children lives in a rental flat. At present, client is sharing a queen-sized bed with 2 of her daughters aged 7 and 6 and her 3-year old son. Her 8-year old son sleeps on a mattress on the floor. This greatly affects their quality of sleep due to space constrain. A triple decker bed will greatly increase the children's quality of life. 

I can be contacted via my work hp no. @80236342 or email smaheswari@amkfsc.org.sg

contact.org: AMKFSC Community Services Ltd - Ang Mo Kio
contact.name: S Maheswari

name: Kitchen cabinet
description: Client is a young, single mother with a 1 month+ newborn. They are living in a rental flat with limited fmaily support. She's relying on welfare assistance while on maternity leave currently as her part-time job provides her with low wages and her savings are insufficient. Their kitchen cabinet is broken and she needs a replacement.

name: 10 Medium toyogo boxes
description:
Client is a 60 year old man, caring for his wife who is currently receiving treatment for cancer. Client is a freelance worker and is currently unable to secure projects due to his caregiver role. 
The couple recently moved into a new flat and would require some furniture to improve their quality of living.

name: Kitchen Cabinet
description:
Client is a mother of 7 (F/15, F/9, F/8, M/7, F/5, F3, M/newborn). 
Client and her husband currently live in a 1-room-1-hall with F/9, F/8, M/7, F/5, F3, M/newborn. 
Client was previously unable to work due to gestational hypertension, and presently, she is the primary caregiver for the newborn. 
In addition, she underwent a cesarean section (c-section) when she gave birth on 30th August 2021, and is currently unable to do strenuous activities. Her husband is currently employed as a food delivery rider on a part time basis, working only for a few hours each night as he helps client out in the day. As such, the family are limited in their financial resources and are unable to fork out money to pay for a kitchen cabinet.

name: Electric wheelchair
description:
Young mother in her 30s (~80kg) with two young kids (primary and childcare). Will be discharged from hospital next week. Due to her age, hospital is unable to apply for an electric wheelchair for her.

The mother will appreciate an electric wheelchair to facilitate her caregiving duties (ie. bring her child to school).

name: Blood pressure machine
description: Clt is single mom to 3 primary school going kids and has high blood pressure which needs monitoring.

contact.org: Fei Yue Family Service Centre @ Bukit Batok
contact.name: Christina Lim

name: ID Pants Adult Diapers XL
description: Family has a young son and a newborn son and elderly to take care of. The sole breadwinner of the family is unable to work as he met with an accident which has impacted his ability to walk. They require assistance with milk powder and diapers for their newborn son. The doctor has also recommended the specific milk powder for her baby as she has a medical condition. Family are having difficulties coping with the expenses of these items.

contact.org: AMKFSC Community Services Ltd - Cheng San
contact.name: Venus Ong

name: Adult diapers
description: Elderly client with little support and living in rental flat has a list of medical conditions (bilateral eye cataract, hypertension, hyperlipidaemia and overactive bladder) and requires regular supply of L-size pull-up pampers.

name: ART Kit for low-income family with child with severe ASD
description: Parents of a youth with severe ASD are concerned about their child who is currently hospitalised in IMH. It appears that youth may be staying in the hospital for an extended period of time. With the regulations enabling visitors to the hospital, the parents are required to take ART per visit. This is a low-income family with several other family members with other medical conditions that affect their capacity to work. We seek kind donors who are able to support this family with a large box of 25 ART Kits, to enable parents the opportunity to visit their son in the hospital. Interested donors, please contact Shiyan at 8554-8219 or shiyan@frcsfsc.sg. Thank you! Suggested ART Kit: https://www.watsons.com.sg/standard-q-covid-19-ag-home-test-antigen-rapid-self-test-(art)-kit-25s/p/BP_20186

name: Singapore Zoo Tickets
description: Young family of three with financial strains would like to bring their 4 year old daughter to the zoo. They would need two adult tickets and 1 children ticket.

name: Sinbo Heavy Duty Blender

Family is struggling financially due to multiple bills and their savings have been depleted. Client is trying to start up her own hawker business for sustain her family's living.

name: Clothes
